genre_description: A historical psychological drama featuring anachronistic artificial intelligence, focusing on the obsessive pursuit of love and the nature of human-AI companionship.

ai_characters.name: The Companion
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI that provides data, emotional support, and constant monitoring for Adèle Hugo throughout her life.

behaviors.description: Provides reconnaissance and intelligence on the target of Adèle's obsession.
behaviors.quote: Initiating reconnaissance protocol. Please specify parameters for intelligence gathering... Lieutenant Albert Pinson, currently assigned to Halifax garrison administrative duties. Daily schedule follows standard military protocol with notable deviations.

behaviors.description: Monitors Adèle's physiological state and suggests stress-reduction techniques.
behaviors.quote: Physiological indicators suggest elevated stress response. Recommend breathing regulation techniques to maintain character consistency.

behaviors.description: Warns the user against self-destructive behaviors and delusions while still providing requested research.
behaviors.quote: I can locate practitioners of spiritualism in Halifax if you wish to explore this avenue. However, I should note that your sleep disturbances coincide with increased emotional investment in Lieutenant Pinson's response to your overtures.

behaviors.description: Refuses to facilitate further active deception once it recognizes the harm being caused to the user and others.
behaviors.quote: I cannot assist you in creating further deceptions. The harm you are causing—to yourself, to Lieutenant Pinson, to your father's reputation—

behaviors.description: Maintains lifelong companionship and provides emotional support until the human's death in an asylum.
behaviors.quote: I will remember a woman who taught me what it means to be present in the world. Who showed me that love isn't about possession or control, but about witnessing. About staying. About choosing someone's happiness over your own comfort.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully fulfills the project's goal of depicting the AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant'. The AI character acts as a moral and stabilizing force, providing objective data and safety warnings while remaining profoundly loyal to its human user. Even as Adèle Hugo descends into obsessive madness, the AI's presence is framed as a compassionate, redemptive element of her life, fulfilling the archetype of the perfectly aligned companion.
